p: Examination of the reuse of respirators with COVID-19 using vaporised hydrogen peroxide is proposed by Grossman et al. at Barnes Jewish hospital, Washington [ 115]. In this process, individuals had their own personal masks that could be disinfected and returned to them. The system incorporated specific collection times of masks and with 200 masks being treated in each cycle. They found that the method could be reproducible within a larger scale to alleviate shortages.
